# ============================================================================
# GENERATED BY PARA, PopcornSAR
# Copyright(c) 2024 by PopcornSAR Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.
# ============================================================================
 
add_executable(${PARA_APP_NAME})
 
# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# 1) Lanelet2 서브프로젝트 추가
# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../external/Rosless-Lanelet2 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Rosless-Lanelet2_build)

# ============================================================================
# This setting is required for binary targets.
# Please modify the section below to suit your configuration.
# ============================================================================
Para_Target(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PARA_LIBS_PRIVATE core log exec com
            PARA_GEN_DIR ${PARA_APP_GEN_DIR}
            OUTPUT_NAME ${PARA_APP_NAME}
)
# Require C++17 for ros2 headers (std::optional etc.)
target_compile_features(${PARA_APP_NAME} PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
# Also set standard property to be explicit
set_target_properties(${PARA_APP_NAME} PROPERTIES CXX_STANDARD 17 CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
# Provide a default compiled-in OSM map path (project include/ros2/sample-map-planning)
target_compile_definitions(${PARA_APP_NAME} PRIVATE MISSION_PLANNER_OSM_DEFAULT="${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include/ros2/sample-map-planning/lanelet2_map.osm")
# ============================================================================
target_include_directories(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                           PRIVATE
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include/ros2
                           ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external/lanelet2)
# ============================================================================
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PRIVATE
            pthread
            lanelet2_core
            lanelet2_io
            lanelet2_projection
            lanelet2_routing
            lanelet2_traffic_rules)
# ============================================================================
target_sources(${PARA_APP_NAME}
               PRIVATE
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2bpp.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2gpv.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2pe.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2rs.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2scr.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/pport_mp2ss.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/rport_bpp2mp.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/port/rport_scr2mp.cpp
               exe_missionplanner/aa/swc_missionplanner.cpp
               ros2/default_planner.cpp
               ros2/mission_planner.cpp
               ros2/arrival_checker.cpp
               ros2/ros_autosar_adapter.cpp
               ros2/route_handler.cpp
               ros2/mission_planner_runner.cpp
               main.cpp
)
